name: Back2Work
description:
YOU GO ON WITHOUT ME! I'LL HOLD THEM BACK!
a solo-dev jam entry for Ludum Dare 50!

try and survive for as long as possible to give your friends enough time to escape.
the helicopter will be here in 2 minutes so any time survived will be taken from that.

MOVE – Left Thumbstick / WASD

AIM – Right Thumbstick / Arrow Keys

SHOOT – Right Shoulder / Spacebar

DODGE – Left ShouldeR / Left Shift
